partners.name: Jahoo Gibbon Camp
partners.description: Community-run eco-lodge protecting gibbons in Cambodia's northeastern forests.

partners.name: Elephant Care Unchained
partners.description: Working to free captive elephants and provide ethical alternatives to traditional camps.

partners.name: Andaman Turtle Watch
partners.description: Marine conservation and sea turtle monitoring on Thailand's Andaman coast.

partners.name: Elephant Valley Project
partners.description: Hands-off elephant sanctuary in Mondulkiri, Cambodia, providing refuge for rescued elephants since 2006.
